1.tips: Early selection of weapons will greatly improve oneself combat effectiveness

2.tips: If the skill you have a choice of isn't what you want, try swapping out a batch

3.tips: strengthening stats will make combat easier

4.tips: Unlocking the chest gives you a chance to acquire a super weapon

5.tips: More chests will upgrade your skills faster

6.tips: In 30 minutes we have a super powerful boss

7.tips: The right mix of skills makes it easier to beat the game
